alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 2:12AM PDT until April 12 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MDT /11 PM PDT/ TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT /5 PM PDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches, except 6 to 12 inches over the mountains with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on Monday afternoon. * WHERE...Harney County, Baker County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...From midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight to 6 PM MDT /5 PM PDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County
